website_summaries.verdict: With few upgrades from last year console release, Madden NFL 13 is a disappointing entry in the long-running series.
pros: Solid core mechanicsHard-fought victories are satisfying
cons: Based on 2012's console game, not 2013'sSerious frame rate issuesOutdated team rankings

customer_reviews.title: Gameplay is OK but Performance Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The menu and pregame/sim stuff is very slow. Gameplay is ok. Totally different game than PSP version (Madden 12) but the 12 game on PSP is way more nimble. Franchise mode takes forever and is horrible on this version. No match for the PSP versions. The franchise mode was one of my favorite gameplay options.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Madden 13
customer_reviews.text: OK, on a handheld I am looking for graphics that are appealing and push the hardware. I am also looking for good control. I am pleased with Madden 13's graphics, I haven't experienced the lag or stuttering other reviews indicate (some cut scenes slow a bit but game play has been smooth). Do I think the graphics are pushing the system? I hope not because there is room for improvement. The game controls well, dual sticks and all the buttons you need mke this a playable portable experience.
customer_reviews.author: LacrosseD

customer_reviews.title: Madden has never looked better on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Gaming on the go has improved over the years, Madden 13 on the Vita really takes it to a new level. The game is fun, all the modes are here the only downside is it feels too much like last years version. The touch control and making plays on the fly are fun. Gotta say if you got a PS VITA and an interest in football this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I just hate the presentation of the product
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that I am very bad at playing games and I need to read the instructions before playing a new game. When I received this game in the mail, I only found a plastic cover around the chip. There were no instructions or any indication of how to play the game. The packaging presentation is terrible and I am never buying anything from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: my son called it the greatest game ever
customer_reviews.text: Between my son and myself, we have almost every version of this game since the franchise started. My son loved the way the vita controller abilities have been integrated. He has played both the superstar and franchise mode and love both. This is not a completely stripped down version of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Guy

customer_reviews.title: For a Vita game - Really amazing
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have all the features of a regular console game. However, the game itself is addicting and fun to play. My only qualms is the loading times are a bit ridiculous but that's most of the games on the Vita. I recommend it to everyone. I love Madden (portable on my Vita)
customer_reviews.author: Director of IT

customer_reviews.title: Game arrived dirty and not working
customer_reviews.text: Game arrived dirty and not working, the metal prices on the back of the disk were all covered in some kind of gunk, I know have to replace this a few days before Christmas, why you would send something out in that condition I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great game, but I am not getting hang of ...
customer_reviews.text: great game, but I am not getting hang of it how to play it, only played like 3 times and then sitting in the ps game cover
customer_reviews.author: Arth

customer_reviews.title: Game
customer_reviews.text: I play this game on a regular basis. I really enjoy this game. I can sit and wait for hours waiting at a salon for my significant other and be happy playing a game I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H. Joe, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The best mobile version of madden yet!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After owning the ipod touch,and using the the madden app 11-12, i decided to buy a ps vita (W/madden). The quality of gameplay is almost ps3. The graphics are excellent, and is the best mobile gameplay by far! The rosters are very good, and i love the game modes. Now if they came out with nba 2k13...................
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: The graphics are so good.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of traveling, so I bought the PSV, and Im loving it. This game is great, and I love the graphics.
customer_reviews.author: RobSegura82

customer_reviews.title: Its the same ole thing
customer_reviews.text: It's too bad that EA doesn't have any competition in the football game market. This gives them a mandate to create a crappy game. "Hey where else are you gonna go? We've got you held hostage." Bring back 2k football!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Cover could have been in english
customer_reviews.text: The game is fine but I was a bit concerned when this arrived and the cover was in Spanish. It has been way to long since I took Spanish to understand full sentences. :)
customer_reviews.author: Puttster

customer_reviews.title: Son plays it with his dad
customer_reviews.text: He doesn't really like to play this by himself but will play it for hours with my husband. My son is 11 and even last year he thought it was a little hard to play but now he totally can.
customer_reviews.author: M. Petric

customer_reviews.title: This game is a blast
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played madden in a couple years so I picked this up to see how it would be. It's a blast! I play just about every night and am finishing my 3rd franchise season.
customer_reviews.author: Klem

customer_reviews.title: Good game. Not as good as on a console ...
customer_reviews.text: Good game. Not as good as on a console but way better than football game you can download on your cell phone. Well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps With The Madden Plan
customer_reviews.text: This game keeps pace with the Madden NFL name. Game play is very quick and exciting. The graphics on the PSVita are awesome.

customer_reviews.title: loving it

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am exeedingly happy about this purchase. I am an enormous fan of the madden games and the fact that I could get it for a reasonable price. This is my favorite game for my ps vita. Thank you so much!

customer_reviews.title: Good handheld football game
customer_reviews.text: I agree with alot of the other reviews that this is a good solid football game on the Vita. It is not quite as good as on the PS3, but still an excellent game. Graphics are good and the gameplay is fun.

customer_reviews.title: My review of Madden 13
customer_reviews.text: This game has been very good. Madden Moments Live and the online features are very accessible and don't crash that often. With the Superstar mode you can take a picture of you which is a very cool feature and the Franchise mode is great so buy the game

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good game
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good game! Just as good as madden 25 and certainly better than the madden 15! Biggest things i enjoy with this is the fact that you can perform field goal/punt blocks and surprise onside kicks!

customer_reviews.title: MADDEN 2K13

customer_reviews.title: game
customer_reviews.text: i am very please with the product, i received it in a very promptly manner, and the product works perfectly i wish i

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my son and he plays it all the time this game is great for kids
customer_reviews.author: cass6777

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Even though its mostly just a port of Madden 12 and the only available football game for the Vita at the moment, its worth picking up if you're looking for a sports game on the go. The gameplay is great. The controls are responsive. The graphics are decent enough, though I'd expect more from the Vita. One of the BIGGEST downfalls is the lack of ad-hoc play. You can't just have two people in the same room link up wirelessly and go at it. Instead, you have to have access to the internet. Other than that, I'd recommend it, again, for those looking for a sports game play on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Combat Medic

customer_reviews.title: Game issues
customer_reviews.text: Madden NFL 13 a lot game errors come up and the game locks up. I don't if is product or the game I received at should a low price
customer_reviews.author: MATTy1042

customer_reviews.title: Madden
customer_reviews.text: Basic madden game, no wheres near ps3/xbox. Yet it is still fun to play. Wish they had used the same engine and features as the consol version.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift to Grandson

customer_reviews.title: Madden on Vita
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for this game in stores and couldn't find it. Got here for a good price and it was well worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocrity at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Madden has truly just fallen flat on its face the past few years. This is what happens when there is no competition to make a strong company like EA fight for the number one spot. Madden 13 for the PS3 was ok, and on the Vita, it was garbage. I truly have no more to say than that.

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: The game has worked just as I expected it to, it even exceeded my expectations. The game is amazing and I love it

customer_reviews.title: Fun and pretty on the go
customer_reviews.text: Madden on the vita is a blast, had a lot of fun while playing. A terrific 1st installment for the franchise on vita, in hopes each year brings even more improvements.

customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this game. My son is impressed also. They play a lot of games so it takes a lot to impress them.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Best Sport Game On Vita So Far !!!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom line is EA delivered and gave sports fans a Madden on the go that's good and FUN !!! Pretty good graphics and controls. I like the way its easier to run and pass on offense compared to Maaden 12. Also the kicking game is much easier to control on Vita, I just kicked a 50 yard FG !!! Overall, I am happy and would recommend this game for Vita. Buy it and show your friends what the Vita can do !!! We have to support this Awesome System. Looking forward to more great Vita games this fall like Little Big Planet, Assassins Creed, COD Black Ops, NFS,Sly Cooper and PS All-Stars !!!

Controlls well tons of options and play mods. and when it gets easy to beat teams change the skill levels and its challenging again. Only other game i got is MLB13 only 2 i bought directly rest are from the PSPLUS program. WOuld Recomend this to any Madden football fan for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Madden 12 in a Madden 13 wrapper
customer_reviews.text: Game is very choppy and pretty much is the same game as Madden 12 in a cheap rollout for '13. I have bought the madden franchise since the SNES days and I am probably disappointed with this one the most because it underutilizes the Vita capabilities and is a cheap copy. Hopefully '14 will be better for Vita but I will wait for initial reviews before I buy.

product_meta.title: Madden NFL 13 - PlayStation Vita
product_meta.description:
Platform:PlayStation VitaFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Madden NFL 13 debuts on the PlayStation Vita, delivering the ultimate NFL experience on a handheld. Become an NFL Superstar or build the league's next Dynasty utilizing the Vita's touch screens that provide unprecedented control, unlocking new layers of gameplay and feature depth. Experience Sundays like never before with all-new commentary from Jim Nantz and Phil Simms as you battle friends online and climb the leaderboard with each victory, or use the motion sensor function to control direction when kicking field goals. Madden NFL 13 for Vita lets NFL fans dominate at home or while on the road.
feature_bullets: Only on Vita The Vita's front and rear touch screens provide an unprecedented amount of control and feature depth, from drawing hot routes to swatting passes and stripping the ball; Use the motion sensor function to control direction when kicking field goals
All New Commentary Every game has the feel of a nationally televised broadcast with CBS Sports commentators Jim Nantz and Phil Simms calling the action from the booth

Authentic Franchise Mode Build the next great dynasty with the most robust Franchise Mode ever created on a handheld device includes expanded rosters, pre-season cut days, an updated rookie scouting system, a free-agent bidding system, player roles, in-season hot and cold streaks, and much more

Become a Superstar Create an NFL Superstar and guide his career from pre draft workout all the way to the Hall of Fame; Control the growth of your superstar with an updated progression system that allows you to earn skill points during practice and in games; Brand new position specific coordinator audio coaches your growth on field as an NFL player
Take Your Game Online Battle opponents head to head over WiFi, working your way up the leader boards with every victory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
